content: Go to TB menu >Account Settings and click the 'Set as Default' button upper R. side for one of the accounts.
creator: siffemoz

content:
While on the compose page, click TB Menu Bar > View > Toolbars > Composition Toolbar.

If you don't see the menu bar on top, press the ALT key.

BTW, pressing Ctrl-Enter also sends the message.
creator: siffemoz
